name: juandesant.github.io
tagline: My public page in GitHub via GitHub.io
body:
### GitHub Page of Juande Santander Vela

Welcome to my GitHub page!

You can find the projects I'm working on in GitHub by navigating to [my repositories](https://github.com/juandesant).

You can also be interested in the works of the AMIGA group:

* Capturing scientific methods as workflows with the help of the Wf4Ever project
* Creating modules for astronomical data processing in the Taverna workflow engine: AstroTaverna

### Other personal pages

* [@juandesant](https://twitter.com/juandesant)
* My personal blog: [Memoria de Acceso Aleatorio (Random Access Memory, in Spanish)](http://www.entremaqueros.com/bitacoras/memoria/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
